content: currently i can't validate in Simplifier, i'm always getting a Cannot process the requesterror. Backend down?

@Patrick Werner Thanks for the shout out, but my first sanity checks looks OK:

  • Validation on a Snippet: https://simplifier.net/snippet/wardweistra/3/$validate
  • Validation of a project resource: https://simplifier.net/nictizstu3-zib2017/nl-core-patient/$validate

Perhaps you typed something in https://simplifier.net/validate that couldn't even be parsed as XML or JSON? It's not handling that gracefully :smile:
its already working again :+1: It was down for 5-10 minutes
